text: The Sweetheart Tree is a 1965 studio album by Johnny Mathis. It was released on 30 September, 1965 through Mercury Records and went to number 71 in the United States. ==Track listing (US version)== ===Side one=== #"A Wonderful Day Like Today" from The Roar of
